summary: The Ayleids, also known as the Wild Elves or Heartland High Elves, were the first race to establish an empire in Tamriel, but faded off into obscurity. Until now, the Ayleid have been resurrected in the troubling time of the events of Skyrim. You can now play as the ancient Ayleid race with this new race mod.
descriptionHtml:
[i][b][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]The Ayleids, also known as the Wild Elves or Heartland High Elves, were the first race to establish an empire in Tamriel, and had ruled modern-day Cyrodiil for countless years dating back to before recorded history. Ayleidoon, their language, is similar to Aldmeris, the ancient language of the Aldmer. The Ayleids were the original founders of the Imperial City, which they called the "Temple of the Ancestors". Their cities were amazing feats of architecture ranging from small settlements to gigantic, labyrinth-like metropolises shaped out of whitish rock. They also seem to have had a firm grasp of the magical arts, as many of their ruins contain stones filled with magicka essences harvested from the sky. However, their empire collapsed in the early First Era. They also developed what came to be called the school of Alteration, as they were skilled in magics such as shape-shifting and levitation. As for their appearance, like all elves, they were most likely thin and lean with pointed ears and angular facial features. Their complexion was lighter than that of the Dunmer, but they were darker than Altmer. While it's believed that the Ayleids remain in the wilds of every province on Tamriel, sightings have been few. There have been no known sightings in the Third or Fourth Eras. [/font][/b][/i]

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][i][b]Until now. The Ayleid have been resurrected in the troubling time of the events of Skyrim. You can now play as the ancient Ayleid race with this new race mod. [/b][/i][/font]

                                [img width=630,height=354]http://i.imgur.com/qhIKDsn.jpg[/img]


[center][font=Verdana][b]Ayleid's are born with a natural resistance to Magic; 50% resistance to Magic
Ayleid's Racial powers are the ability to inveterate deeply into their magicka. Call upon their Heartland racial ability to greatly increase their Alteration abilities.

Version 1.5
Skill Bonuses
Alteration - 10
Conjuration - 5
Speech - 5
Destruction - 5
Restoration - 5
Enchanting - 5[/b]
[/font][/center]

Release date: 11 November 2016

Category:Armor and Weapons
Author: Mazetism ([url=http://mazetism-is-dumb.tumblr.com/]http://mazetism-is-dumb.tumblr.com/[/url])
Version:1.0

REQUIREMENTS
============
[u]Skyrim, Update[/u][u] & Dawnguard
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/?]RaceCompatibility for Skyrim and Dawnguard by [b]TMPhoenix[/b][/url][/u]

RECOMMENDED
==========
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33504/?]AlfheimKnights by [b]Jgreybear[/b][/url] for Ayleid like Armor and Weapons
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31485/?]Wrath of Nature - The Path of the Druid by [b]Bluarchon[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17582/?]Equipment Of Eternal Shine - Elven Overhaul by [b]lKocMoHaBTl[/b][/url]



The Female Body has it's own unique folder for body meshes and textures.

If you have your own preferred Body Texture (Because I use Real Girls and Mature Skin) You can easily copy and paste your textures into the mod's folder (textures\WERWildElves\Character Assets\Female\) Folder.

If you use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit by tktk1[/url], you will need to place the .ini file that I am including in the optional downloads where you can fully edit the race. Since I don't personally use Racemenu, I don't know what to tell you.

If you like it, please Endorse and if you don't like it

[img width=463,height=304]http://i.imgur.com/X01p6ZR.jpg[/img]

[center][size=5]Check out my Tumblr for stuff I can't release here. [url=http://mazetism-is-dumb.tumblr.com/]Mazetism is Dumb[/url][/size][/center][url=http://mazetism-is-dumb.tumblr.com/]
[/url]
author: Mazetism
